name: Ghost Town (itch) (RasmusBerenth)
description:
Ghost Town is a fast-paste endless runner in which the player avoids dangers while collecting the lost souls to gain score points. 

You play as a ghost running through the environment and a combination of jumping, gliding and diving to avoid obstacles and collect lost souls all while being chased by a mysterious monster. 

Keep running and see how long you'll last.

*PS Play on fullscreen for the best experience*
